Plugins.name: Advanced Canvas
Plugins.desc: Supercharge your canvas experience! Create presentations, flowcharts and more!

Plugins.name: AnyBlock
Plugins.desc: You can flexibility to create a 'Block' by some means. It also provides some useful features, like `list to table`.

Plugins.name: Better Export PDF
Plugins.desc: Export your notes to PDF, support export preview, add bookmarks outline and header/footer.

Plugins.name: Better Markdown Links
Plugins.desc: Adds support for angle bracket links and manages relative links properly

Plugins.name: Commander
Plugins.desc: Customize your workspace by adding commands everywhere, create Macros and supercharge your mobile toolbar.

Plugins.name: Quick Switcher++
Plugins.desc: Enhanced Quick Switcher, search open panels, and symbols.

Plugins.name: Dataview
Plugins.desc: Complex data views for the data-obsessed.

Plugins.name: Dust Calendar
Plugins.desc: 更符合中国习惯的日历，可以显示农历、节气、节假日、调休信息，支持月视图和年视图切换，支持关联创建周期性笔记。

Plugins.name: Easy Typing
Plugins.desc: This plugin aims to enhance and optimize the editing experience in Obsidian

Plugins.name: Editing Toolbar
Plugins.desc: The Obsidian Editing Toolbar is modified from cmenu, which provides more powerful customization settings and has many built-in editing commands to be a MS Word-like toolbar editing experience.

Plugins.name: External Rename Handler
Plugins.desc: Handles renames made outside of the app

Plugins.name: File Tree Alternative
Plugins.desc: This plugin allows you to have an alternative file tree view.

Plugins.name: Find orphaned files and broken links
Plugins.desc: Find files that are not linked anywhere and would otherwise be lost in your vault. In other words: files with no backlinks.

Plugins.name: Floating Search
Plugins.desc: You can use search view in modal/leaf/popout window now.

Plugins.name: floating toc
Plugins.desc: This is a floating Toc plugin that  hovers a table of content  containing a header level on the notes sidebar.

Plugins.name: Folder notes
Plugins.desc: Create notes within folders that can be accessed without collapsing the folder, similar to the functionality offered in Notion.

Plugins.name: Fuzzy Chinese Pinyin
Plugins.desc: Provide the function of fuzzy search using Chinese Pinyin.

Plugins.name: Hotkey Helper
Plugins.desc: Easily see and access any plugin's settings or hotkey assignments (and conflicts) from the Community Plugins tab

Plugins.name: Image Converter
Plugins.desc: Convert, compress, resize, annotate, markup, draw, crop, rotate, flip, align images directly in Obsidian. Drag-resize, rename with variables, batch process. WEBP, JPG, PNG, HEIC, TIF.

Plugins.name: Janitor
Plugins.desc: Performs cleanup tasks on the Obsidian vault

Plugins.name: Keyboard Analyzer
Plugins.desc: See and analyse your keyboard hotkeys and shortcuts

Plugins.name: Ledger
Plugins.desc: Plain text accounting

Plugins.name: Legacy vault switcher
Plugins.desc: For switching back to the legacy vault switcher.

Plugins.name: Links
Plugins.desc: Manipulate links

Plugins.name: MAKE.md
Plugins.desc: Make.md gives you everything you need to organize and personalize your notes.

Plugins.name: Markdown Table Editor
Plugins.desc: An Obsidian plugin to provide an editor for Markdown tables. It can open CSV, Microsoft Excel/Google Sheets data as Markdown tables from Obsidian Markdown editor.

Plugins.name: MySnippets
Plugins.desc: MySnippets is a plugin that adds a status bar menu allowing the user to quickly toggle their snippets on and off 🖌.

Plugins.name: Natural Language Dates Redux
Plugins.desc: Work with dates in natural language. Now with Notion-like behavior!

Plugins.name: Note Refactor
Plugins.desc: Extract note content into new notes and split notes

Plugins.name: Admonition
Plugins.desc: Enhanced callouts for Obsidian.md

Plugins.name: Advanced URI
Plugins.desc: Advanced modes for Obsidian URI

Plugins.name: Auto Hide
Plugins.desc: Collapse sidebars when clicking on the editor/viewer panel

Plugins.name: Auto Link Title
Plugins.desc: This plugin automatically fetches the titles of links from the web

Plugins.name: Excalidraw
Plugins.desc: An Obsidian plugin to edit and view Excalidraw drawings

Plugins.name: Export Image plugin
Plugins.desc: Easily convert your article to image.

Plugins.name: Front Matter Title
Plugins.desc: Lets you define a title in frontmatter to be displayed as the filename for explorer, graph, search and etc.

Plugins.name: Heading Shifter
Plugins.desc: Easily Shift and Change markdown headings.

Plugins.name: Hover Editor
Plugins.desc: Transform the Page Preview hover popover into a fully working editor instance

Plugins.name: Importer
Plugins.desc: Import data from Notion, Evernote, Apple Notes, Microsoft OneNote, Google Keep, Bear, Roam, and HTML files.

Plugins.name: Kanban
Plugins.desc: Create markdown-backed Kanban boards in Obsidian.

Plugins.name: Latex Suite
Plugins.desc: Make typesetting LaTeX math as fast as handwriting through snippets, text expansion, and editor enhancements

Plugins.name: Linter
Plugins.desc: Formats and styles your notes. It can be used to format YAML tags, aliases, arrays, and metadata; footnotes; headings; spacing; math blocks; regular markdown contents like list, italics, and bold styles; and more with the use of custom rule options as well.

Plugins.name: List Callouts
Plugins.desc: Create simple callouts in lists.

Plugins.name: Markmind
Plugins.desc: This is a mindmap , outline tool for obsidian.

Plugins.name: Meta Bind
Plugins.desc: Make your notes interactive with inline input fields, metadata displays, and buttons.

Plugins.name: Outliner
Plugins.desc: Work with your lists like in Workflowy or RoamResearch.

Plugins.name: Projects
Plugins.desc: Plain text project planning.

Plugins.name: Quiet Outline
Plugins.desc: Make outline quiet and more powerful, including no-auto-expand, rendering heading as markdown, and search support.

Plugins.name: Relative Line Numbers
Plugins.desc: Enables relative line numbers in editor mode

Plugins.name: Style Settings
Plugins.desc: Offers controls for adjusting theme, plugin, and snippet CSS variables.

Plugins.name: TagFolder
Plugins.desc: Show tags as folder

Plugins.name: Tasks
Plugins.desc: Track tasks across your vault. Supports due dates, recurring tasks, done dates, sub-set of checklist items, and filtering.

Plugins.name: Force note view mode
Plugins.desc: This plugin allows to force the view mode and editing mode for a note by using front matter

Plugins.name: Zoom
Plugins.desc: Zoom into heading and lists.

Plugins.name: BRAT
Plugins.desc: Easily install a beta version of a plugin for testing.

Plugins.name: Strange New Worlds
Plugins.desc: Help see how your vault is interconnected with visual indicators.

Plugins.name: PDF++
Plugins.desc: The most Obsidian-native PDF annotation tool ever.

Plugins.name: Plugin Proxy
Plugins.desc: For visiting plugin market quickly.

Plugins.name: Quick Explorer
Plugins.desc: Perform file explorer operations (and see your current file path) from the title bar, using the mouse or keyboard

Plugins.name: QuickAdd
Plugins.desc: Quickly add new pages or content to your vault.

Plugins.name: Recent Files
Plugins.desc: List files by most recently opened

Plugins.name: Refresh Preview
Plugins.desc: Allows to refresh preview mode without reopening the note

Plugins.name: Remotely Save
Plugins.desc: Yet another unofficial plugin allowing users to synchronize notes between local device and the cloud service.

Plugins.name: Settings Search
Plugins.desc: Globally search settings in Obsidian.md

Plugins.name: Slash Commander
Plugins.desc: Customize the slash command list, assign each command an icon.

Plugins.name: Solve
Plugins.desc: Supercharge your notes with real-time calculations without AI fuss. From dates ('Now + 20 days'), percentages ('10% of 120'), units of measurement ('100cm + 2m'), arithmetic ('10 + 5') and more!

Plugins.name: Status Bar Organizer
Plugins.desc: Lets you rearrange and hide specific status bar elements.

Plugins.name: Advanced Tables
Plugins.desc: Improved table navigation, formatting, manipulation, and formulas

Plugins.name: Templater
Plugins.desc: Create and use templates

Plugins.name: Typewriter Mode
Plugins.desc: Typewriter scroll, highlight current line, dim unfocused paragraphs and sentences, writing focus, restore cursor position and more.

Plugins.name: Paste URL into selection
Plugins.desc: Paste URL "into" selected text.

Plugins.name: VARE
Plugins.desc: Now you can easily manage your plugins and themes. Simply select the version you want or install unlisted versions from GitHub. You can also install beta version and switch back if necessary.

Plugins.name: Various Complements
Plugins.desc: This plugin enables you to complete words like the auto-completion of IDE

Plugins.name: Vertical Tabs
Plugins.desc: Offer an alternative view that displays open tabs vertically, allowing users to group and organize tabs for a better navigation experience.

Plugins.name: Vim Toggle
Plugins.desc: A plugin for Obsidian that enables the toggling vim mode to on and off inside of the editor.

Plugins.name: Virtual Linker / Glossary
Plugins.desc: Automatically creates virtual links for text within your notes that match the titles or aliases of other notes in your vault. Create a glossary-like functionality, show unlinked mentions and transform them to real links.

Plugins.name: Day Planner
Plugins.desc: A day planner with clean UI and readable syntax

Plugins.name: Extended Graph
Plugins.desc: Extends the features of the core Graph view, display images, manage states, remove links, change node shapes, and more.

Plugins.name: Private Mode
Plugins.desc: Simple #private mode

Plugins.name: Note Toolbar
Plugins.desc: Add customizable toolbars to your notes.

Plugins.name: Media Extended
Plugins.desc: Media(Video/Audio) Playback Enhancement for Obsidian.md

Plugins.name: Block Link Plus
Plugins.desc: Enhances right-click menu and global command with direct links to blocks and titles, adds support for multi-line blockquotes, and offers extensive customization options for block IDs.

Plugins.name: UNITADE.md
Plugins.desc: Effortlessly treat any file extension as note, organize diverse file formats in your vault and take advancements in control of extension system even with custom modals.

Plugins.name: Task Genius
Plugins.desc: Comprehensive task management that includes progress bars, task status cycling, and advanced task tracking features.

Plugins.name: Daily Notes Editor
Plugins.desc: Edit a bunch of daily notes in one page(inline), which works similar to Roam Research's default daily note view.

Plugins.name: Better Search Views
Plugins.desc: Outliner-like breadcrumb trees for search, backlinks and embedded queries

Plugins.name: Novel word count
Plugins.desc: Displays a word count (and more!) for each file, folder and vault in the File Explorer pane.

Plugins.name: Vault Explorer
Plugins.desc: Explore your vault in visual format

Plugins.name: Quick Peek Sidebar
Plugins.desc: Opens the left and/or right side panel by hovering over it.

Plugins.name: Codeblock Customizer
Plugins.desc: This Obsidian plugin lets you customize your codeblocks in editing, and reading mode as well.

Plugins.name: Floating Settings
Plugins.desc: Open the Floating Settings panel or replace the default settings modal with a floating panel. Depends on the Hover Editor.
